item.title: Youtube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are a dynamic YouTube channel seeking talented video editors to help create engaging and high-quality 10-minute videos. Our content focuses on documentaries.

We provide scripts and voiceovers and some source materials, including some but not all videos and pictures. Additional footage needs to be royalty-free or sourced from YouTube under the fair use policy with proper attribution.

Responsibilities:

Edit 10-minute YouTube videos using provided voiceovers and source materials.
Source and incorporate royalty-free videos and images as needed, ensuring compliance with fair use policies.
Enhance videos with transitions, effects, graphics, and music to improve viewer engagement.
Ensure the final video is polished, professional, and aligns with our brand's style and tone.
Collaborate with our team to receive feedback and make necessary revisions.
Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing, with a portfolio of completed YouTube videos.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve).
Strong understanding of YouTube's fair use policies and attribution requirements.
Ability to source royalty-free videos and images and attribute them correctly.
Creative mindset with a keen eye for detail and storytelling.
Excellent communication skills and ability to meet deadlines.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 00:47 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Documentary, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Documentary, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Short Video Edit Video WIth Graphic Overlay - Upwork
item.description:
Start Up Fashion Brand Needs To make a short introduction video for the brand to use as a placeholder for the build of the brands new website

WE NEED TO MAKE 1 x 30 Sec + Video

Need the Same video cut into 2 x Dimension Formats - LANDSCAPE (Desktop) & PORTRAIT (mobile)- both to be used as place holders as we build out this site aesthetic

Video content snippets will be supplied & have been generated using AI Text To Video programs, provided as 5- 10 second clips, which are to be cut & merged together with the graphic overlay of text - see attached 3 x video snippets as examples of the video content you will be working on

BRAND NAME:  The Silk & Cashmere Company
DEMONSTRATE: Silk Dresses & Cashmere Fashion items


TEXT TO USE THROUGH THE VIDEO ROLL:

THE SILK & CASHMERE COMPANY
A Touch Of Luxury For Every Day

100% PURE SILK FABRICATIONS
PREMIUM MULBERRY SILK

SOFT LUXURIOUS CASHMERE
Timeless Elegance For The Modern Woman

Summer 2024 New Arrivals Out Now

THE SILK & CASHMERE COMPANY


PLEASE MAKE SURE That Silk Messages are overlaid OVER SILK VIDEO SNIPPETS (as designated by naming of file) & that Cashmere fabric messages are overlaid over CASHMERE VIDEO SNIPPETS ONLY

ALL VIDEO FILES WILL BE SUPPLIED

PLEASE NOTE this video is for a fashion brand so you will need to choose beautiful fonts & ensure that the speed & tone of the video reflects both high end fashion & Top Quality fashion as well as including stylish transitions between frames


PLEASE NOTE: This is a very simple job & i would like this one done within 24 hours at most - where if it is good, there is scope for lots of fashion video & photo editing


Budget: $50
Posted On: June 23, 2024 00:27 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics
Country: Australia
click to apply

2) should be capable of editing canva posts
3) following up with freelancers and leading

item.title: Drone Videographer for 1-hour Recording in New York - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled drone videographer to capture high-quality aerial footage for a 1-hour recording in New York. The ideal candidate should have experience in drone operation and be familiar with the local regulations and restrictions. The footage will be used for a promotional video project, so attention to detail and creativity are essential. The videographer should be able to navigate the drone smoothly and capture stunning shots from various angles.

    Skills required:
    - Drone operation
    - Aerial videography
    - Knowledge of New York drone regulations
    - Attention to detail
    - Creativity

    This is a small-sized project with a duration of under 1 month. We are looking for an intermediate-level videographer who can deliver exceptional footage that meets our project requirements. If you are passionate about drone videography and have a portfolio showcasing your previous work, we would love to hear from you!


Posted On: June 22, 2024 23:16 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Production, Drone, Video Editing
Skills: Videography, Video Production, Drone, Video Editing
Country: Hong Kong
click to apply
